General.Name: Kuyas Yatirim AS
General.Description: Kuyas Yatirim A.S. operates as a real estate development company in Turkey. It constructs projects, such as hotels, additional workshop units, exhibition and conference areas, gold exchange building, parking area, and training area. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

1.Name: Mr. Sukru  Ozleyen
1.Title: Director of Financial and Admin. Affairs
